3 ^ Put not your trust in princes
column3: in whom there is no salvation.

and he shall return into his earth~; in that day all their thoughts shall perish.

whose hope is in the Lord his God

column3: and all things that are in them~; who keepeth truth for ever

who giveth food to the hungry. The Lord looseth them that are fettered~;
